mapper.insert:
insert into bureau_info
bureau_info.bureau_code, bureau_info.bureau_name,
bureau_info.create_time,
bureau_info.input_code,
bureau_info.is_delete,
bureau_info.operator,
bureau_info.update_time,
values
#{bureauCode}, #{bureauName},
#{createTime},
#{inputCode},
#{isDelete},
#{operator},
#{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update bureau_info
bureau_info.bureau_code = #{bureauCode},
bureau_info.bureau_name = #{bureauName},
bureau_info.create_time = #{createTime},
bureau_info.input_code = #{inputCode},
bureau_info.is_delete = #{isDelete},
bureau_info.operator = #{operator},
bureau_info.update_time = #{updateTime}
where bureau_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select bureau_info.bureau_code, bureau_info.bureau_name, bureau_info.create_time, bureau_info.id, bureau_info.input_code, bureau_info.is_delete, bureau_info.operator, bureau_info.update_time form bureau_info where bureau_info.id = #{id}
